getView(int,android.view.View,android.vi.name: getView(int,android.view.View,android.view.ViewGroup)
getView(int,android.view.View,android.vi.documentation:
If {@link #setViews(List)} has been called, a corresponding view from that list will be returned.

Otherwise, behaves like {@link CursorAdapter#getView(int, View, ViewGroup)}.

setViews(java.util.List\u003candroid.vie.name: setViews(java.util.List<android.view.View>)

name: org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowCursorAdapter
documentation:

Android CursorAdapter will be used instead.
